sentences.sentence: I'm jut a normal eleven-year-old kid.
sentences.translation: 我只是个普通的11岁小孩。

sentences.sentence: Give longneck. Jut your neck out ever-so-slightly.
sentences.translation: 把脖子伸长，把你的脖子稍微伸出来。

sentences.sentence: Scanning down from the jut of my chin to the tips of my toes, I've even managed to brand my feet.
sentences.translation: 从下巴的尖端到脚趾尖扫视下来，我甚至还设法在脚上打上了烙印。
